#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
int a[1001][1001];
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,n,m,x,y,p;
	cin>>m>>n>>p;
	while(p--)
	{
		cin>>x>>y;
		a[x][y]=-1;
	}
	if(a[1][1]==0)
	a[1][1]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
	for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
	{
		if(i==1&& j==1)
		continue;
        if(a[i][j]==-1)
        continue;
        if(a[i-1][j]!=-1)
        {
          a[i][j]+=a[i-1][j]%mod;
		  a[i][j]%=mod;		
        }
		
		if(a[i][j-1]!=-1)
		{
		  a[i][j]+=a[i][j-1];
		  a[i][j]%=mod;	
		}	
	
	}
	if(a[m][n]==-1)
	a[m][n]=0;
	cout<<a[m][n]<<"\n";
}
